title: Looking for support main
body: Hello, my name is Harry and I am a currently B3 ADC main. A big problem I find in soloqueue is a lack of communication and synergy between teammates, and I'm looking for a similarly ranked support player to duo with in order to climb. If you have Skype or curse voice that'd be great too!

replies.body: Lets give it a try.  Add me:  Ho0ps.
Wanna give a norm a try with me? (currently unranked but comfortable in my supping ability)
